title: Design Lane C ControlEngine Scaffold
description: Design the initial scaffold for Lane C (ControlEngine), including its subcomponents: Moderator (policy classification), ClaimsChecker (AllowedClaimsRegistry match), PIIRedactor, and OverrideController. Specify interfaces, event handling, and how policy decisions are emitted to the event bus. Ensure the design supports policy cancel, audit events, and future extensibility.
acceptance_criteria: Interfaces for Moderator, ClaimsChecker, PIIRedactor, and OverrideController are defined
ControlEngine can process transcript and response metadata events
Audit and metrics event emission is included in the design
Design supports stubbed and future-hardened implementations
